title: Chat broken?
body: Is it just me but is chat just disconnecting not even the mobile app is working

replies.body: Since the chat servers are a little different than the actual game servers, it's not entirely unlikely for you to lose your connection to chat and still be able to play. Let's do a little update on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure that a little pick-me-up there doesn't get chat working right again.
